Sisun Electronics Technology (DG) Co., Ltd specializes in manufacturing various mechanical keyboards and gaming mice. The keyboards feature hot-swappable RGB keys, 2.4Ghz/Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and a wired option. The company emphasizes high quality and reliability, with products passing international safety regulations.
